attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: this app was the most horrible thing i’ve ever seen. how is this #1 in news... i hate it here. when i opened the app i immediately saw the most disgusting creature ever... and i threw up all over my phone and my puke soaked in to my screen and now my phone is broken. trump broke my phone. please don’t ban tiktok

attributes.title: from miss jones
attributes.review: this app was the worse! it made my phone crash. i was trying to see what was going on my presidents campaign but it just made my phone crazy! i need it remove! i just know a lot of people are having problems with it! it can’t keep going like these 🙄🙄🙄😒😒😒

attributes.title: absolutely terrible
attributes.review: This app causes nightmares. Never download this. I have experienced the worst things imaginable from this. Please do NOT download this app.

attributes.title: trash
attributes.review: I am very disappointed in this app. It makes me want to hurl every time I open it. Every time I see the oompa loompa. This is not Disney +, stop this foolishness.

attributes.title: Crash
attributes.review: This app is not even working for me my keeps crashing when I use the app

attributes.title: Not Racist Enough 😢

attributes.title: Worst app of 2020 😭
attributes.review: This app is plain awful... so slow and so much spam... i keep seeing this orange with a wig on my screen and I don’t know why.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP, WOUIDNT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: when i first opened the app i saw a clown. it took several days for the app to actually work. it must’ve been the clown i saw in the beginning. whatever you do! DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP!

attributes.title: America is NOT Great!
attributes.review: The app was hard to use and gave no FACTUAL information just opinions that are outdated! I fully feel that this app can help no one. Delete the app!!
